name: Buried Lost Friends
description:
You are a shovel in space. You lost your friends a long time ago, but you've finally gained the power (and motivation) to bring them back together. You discover they are buried in flying dirt blocks, so you start digging... until the enemies appear!

My submission for the Mini Jame Gam # 15. I created it in two days. Make sure to leave a review and give feedback! Game jams are mostly for learning and improving as a developer, so your feedback will be appreciated!

Features:

  • Unlimited friends to rescue each run
  • Unlimited endless runs
  • Three unique enemies to encounter
  • A Challenging bossfight

Controls:

  • Mouse cursor to move
  • Left click to shoot

Made with:

  • Pygame
  • Audacity
  • ChatGPT (jk)

Runs on:

Windows
